verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:11
verses.text: And Jahath was the chief, and Zizah the second: but Jeush and Beriah had not many sons; therefore they were in one reckoning, according to their father’s house.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:12
verses.text: The sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel, four.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:13
verses.text: The sons of Amram; Aaron and Moses: and Aaron was separated, that he should sanctify the most holy things, he and his sons for ever, to burn incense before the Lord, to minister unto him, and to bless in his name for ever.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:14
verses.text: Now concerning Moses the man of God, his sons were named of the tribe of Levi.
